name: Social Security: Extra Help With Medicare Prescription Drug Plan (part D) Costs
description: Helps with the cost of prescription drugs, like deductibles and copays.
fullDescription: Helps with the cost of prescription drugs, like deductibles and copays.
whatTheyOffer: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The applicant is at least 65 years old
- The applicant has a disability or impairment
- The applicant has limited income and resources

Visit the official website or call for more information.
